definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: soil, defile (NH Pi. id.; Aram. Pa. [[טַנֵּף]], t.anep; As. ṭanâpu II, I, Dl:Pr 33; HWB 302; Ar. t.anifa is be suspicious, be intrinsically corrupt)—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Impf. [[אֲטַנְּפֵם]] Ct So 5:3 how should I soil them, i.e. my feet (poet. Aramaism).
